message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8000 by us due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Considering its exceptional benefits, I would like to propose a special introductory price of $7500 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that exceeds expectations in both functionality and aesthetics. Please let me know if this offer suits your needs, and we can proceed with the transaction.
